183E44C9.Line7.101CAF: We were looking to make landfall when outta nowhere, our ship was overrun.

451AADB4.Line11.101CAF: At first, they looked just like any of us - like you or me. Until they claimed every one of my crew.

68747096.VoiceDir7.101CAF: Recalling, with horror, but a bit detached. Having been through a recent trauma, he's still processing.

7499F89E.VoiceDir13.101BAB: Facetiously. The Drowned are monstrous creatures.

9C165321.VoiceDir11.101CAF: Recalling, with horror, but a bit detached. Having been through a recent trauma, he's still processing.
